branchCategory.name: NCA1
branchCategory.description: <p>Series NCA1 medium duty tie rod cylinders are NFPA interchangeable, have a crimped piston rod assembly, are pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches. The NCA1 expanded line of medium duty cylinders offer bore sizes ranging from 5 to 8 inches, and come standard with adjustable air cushion.</p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod w/Options
branchItem.description: <p>NCA1 single rod, double acting, medium duty NFPA interchangeable cylinders. The NCA1 is standard with air cushion, pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches. Ten standard available options make the NCA1 extremely versatile for use in many applications.</p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Temperature Resistant Options
branchItem.description: <p>Series NCA1 medium duty tie rod cylinders are NFPA interchangeable, have a crimped piston rod assembly, are pre-lubricated and available in 12 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches.  The XB6 high temperature resistant option is rated for use in environments up to 300° F (150° C). The XB7 low temperature resistant option is rated for use in environments down to -22° F (-30° C)</p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Oversized Rod
branchItem.description: <p>Series NCA1 medium duty tie rod cylinders are NFPA interchangeable, have a crimped piston rod assembly, are pre-lubricated and available in 12 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches. The oversized rod option is available on both the NCA1 standard rod type (-XB5), and the NCA1K non-rotating rod type (-X119US).</p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Stroke Options
branchItem.description: <p>Series NCA1 medium duty tie rod cylinders are NFPA interchangeable, have a crimped piston rod assembly, are pre-lubricated and available in 12 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches.  The XB9 low speed option allows for smooth movements, even at 0.4 inches per second. The XC8/XC9 adjustable stroke options feature an infinitely adjustable stop position within the adjustable range. </p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Environment Options
branchItem.description: <p>Series NCA1 medium duty tie rod cylinders are NFPA interchangeable, have a crimped piston rod assembly, are pre-lubricated and available in 12 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches.  Environment options include the XC6 stainless steel piston rod, XC22 fluoro-rubber seals, XC35 coil scraper, and X130US stainless steel parts: piston rod, tie rod, tie rod nut, cushion valve needle. </p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)A1K, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Non-rotating
branchItem.description: <p>NCA1 non-rotating single rod, double acting, medium duty NFPA interchangeable cylinders. The NCA1 is standard with air cushion, pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches. </p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)A1W, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchItem.description: <p>NCA1 double rod, double acting, medium duty NFPA interchangeable cylinders. The NCA1 is standard with air cushion, pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches.</p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)A1 NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double or Single Rod, Dual Operation
branchItem.description: <p>NCA1 single rod, dual stroke (XC11) and double rod, dual stroke (XC10), medium duty NFPA interchangeable cylinders. The NCA1 is standard with air cushion, pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches.</p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)A1, Medium Duty Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Large Bore
branchItem.description: <p>NCA1 large bore, single rod, double acting, medium duty NFPA interchangeable cylinders. The NCA1 is standard with air cushion, pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 5, 6 and 8 inches.</p>

branchItem.name: NCA1, Accessory, Eye Bracket
branchItem.description: <p>NCA1 add on eye bracket can be used with double rear clevis mount or double rod clevis options.</p>
